Weapon.Name: Echo Blade
Weapon.Description: A sword that resonates with the ancient powers of sound and vibration, causing disorientation in its targets.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a hum, the blade disrupts the very air around it, leaving foes bewildered.

Weapon.Name: Astral Staff
Weapon.Description: This staff is bound with celestial energies, allowing the wielder to channel powerful cosmic spells.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: Galactic energy surges through the staff, overwhelming adversaries with its might.

Weapon.Name: Phantom Daggers
Weapon.Description: A set of daggers that phase in and out of reality, making it nearly impossible for enemies to predict or parry attacks.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The daggers slice through air and flesh alike, leaving wounds that are slow to heal.
